page.title: 03Racing Pigeons
page.content: IN THE NORTH OF ENGLAND A LOT OF PEOPLE ESPECIALLY MEN,PASS THEIR SPARE TIME BY KEEPING PIGEONS AS THEIR HOBBY AND RACING THEM.THEY KEEP THEM IN THEIR GARDENS WHERE THEY BUILD PIGEON CREES.THEY BUILD THE CREES THEMSELVES, EACH IS PAINTED IN DIFFERENT COLORS.THERE IS A PIGEON CLUB AND EVERY FRIDAY A BIG TRANSPORTER COMES AND THE PIGEONS GO AWAY IN BASKETS AND RACE BACK HOME SOMETIMES THEY RACE FROM AS FAR AS FRANCE.IF YOU GET FIRST SECOND OR THIRD PLACE YOU WIN MONEY SOME OF THE MEN HAVE PRIVATE BETS BETWEEN THEMSELVES.BUT SOMETIMES THE PIGEONS DON'T RETURN THEY EITHER GET LOST OR KILLED.AT THE END OF THE YEAR THEY HAVE A PIGEON DINNER WHERE THE MEN WHO HAVE WON THE MOST POINTS WIN CUPS.THEY GAIN POINTS BY HOW MANY RACES THEY WIN. STUART WOOD
